column2: set_prior("normal(-.1,1)", class = "b")+ #expect positive effect of birds (so negative effect of rats because these not re-leveled) but not too sure because not much previous research, so keep low and wide
set_prior("normal(1.5,1)", class = "Intercept") #expect more recruits than for only Acropora.
mu = log; shape = identity; zi = logit

Draws: 4 chains, each with iter = 3000; warmup = 1000; thin = 1;
         total post-warmup draws = 8000

For each parameter, Bulk_ESS
and Tail_ESS are effective sample size measures, and Rhat is the potential
scale reduction factor on split chains (at convergence, Rhat = 1).
Using 10 posterior draws for ppc type 'dens_overlay' by default.
